edge: The film Hungama 2 is directed by Priyadarshan, who returns to Bollywood after an eight-year hiatus with this comedy.
Both Hungama 2 and Rangrezz are comedies directed by Priyadarshan, although the former is not a sequel to the latter.
The film Hungama 2 was initially scheduled for release on August 14, 2020.
The production of Hungama 2 was halted due to the COVID-19 pandemic in India.
Priyadarshan has indicated that filming for Hungama 2 is scheduled to resume on September 15, 2020.
The film Hungama 2 was wrapped up on February 1, 2021.
Shilpa Shetty returns to acting in Hungama 2 after a 14-year hiatus, following her previous film Apne.
